name: Fractal Forest
description:
This is an interactive concept I made for #procjam2015

The Fractal Forest is the setting for a surreal dungeon crawler.

The player can move around the environment via W, A and D

I wanted to test out a non-rectangular procedural generated outdoor "dungeon" with an unique simplistic art style.

If the browser version has performance issues please try the PC version

I used the path movement system from No Gravity

and the wonderful Kubist app to generate the textures

Feel free to share your thought in the comments ...
